body_html: Well yes in principle I was hoping for a general way to access the feature, not necessarily that specific syntax but some public API that is not particular to XLA. Of course you decide whether or not adding this makes sense/is worth the effort.

body: Well yes in principle I was hoping for a general way to access the feature, not necessarily that specific syntax but some public API that is not particular to XLA. Of course you decide whether or not adding this makes sense/is worth the effort.
